name: LEVEL 5 - The Challenge
description:
Level 5 is a Rage Game based on Retro Theme , It is Created in only 2 Days . There 5 Levels in the Game , Sounds Easy , Right ? , But No They Are Too Had to Complete. It's a Challenge to Complete this Game , Even I can't.

Tutorial :-

Only You Have to Jump by Space Key 

To Use Ability to Run Fast , Left Click

Stand Up On Floating Tiles and Jump Higher

Stay away from Laser , They will Kill You

Cannon Fire Bullets , They also Kills You

You Can Stand on Cannon Too!
